Key Match Events: Jose Iglesias hit a game-winning grounder in the top of the ninth inning, scoring the winning run for the Mets
Pre-Game Insights: The D-backs have a mindset to treat every game the same and have fun, play good baseball, and get the win
The D-backs are in the lead for the National League's top Wild Card spot, but trail the Dodgers in the NL West by 3 1/2 games
Post-Match Reflections: Geraldo Perdomo said he didn't trust his instincts, which led to the game-winning hit, and that he needs to move on
Manager Torey Lovullo said the team wants to be playing good baseball and respect every opponent
Miscellaneous Highlights: The loss drops the D-backs to just their second series loss in their last 13, and they remain in the lead for the National League's top Wild Card spot
The D-backs will face the Dodgers in a crucial four-game series starting Friday
Others: Corbin Carroll's grand slam in the eighth inning Wednesday night erased a late deficit for the D-backs
